nodes.text: A special and secure conference room was located beside the Overbridge of the Death Star battle station. Grand Moff Wilhuff Tarkin held regular meetings with his senior staff in that room. It contained a polished black table with twelve seats arranged around it. Drinks in cups were provided for each attendant.

Tarkin held a meeting there announcing that the Galactic Emperor Sheev Palpatine had just disbanded the Imperial Senate. Other officers present at the meeting included Colonel Wullf Yularen, General Hurst Romodi, General Trech Molock, Chief of the Imperial Navy Admiral Conan Antonio Motti, Chief of the Imperial Army General Cassio Tagge, Chief Major Siward Cass and General Moradmin Bast, amongst others. Like the rest of the station, the conference room was destroyed during the Battle of Yavin.
